Name: Bergan Industries
Description: Bergan Industries was an advanced manufacturing facility, producing such equipment as the Royal variant of the venerable Locust BattleMech for the Star League Defense Force.  Bergan Industries has manufacturing centers on Alshain, Ares, New Earth and New Oslo.  After the Ghost Bears absorbed the Free Rasalhague Republic, Bergan Industries opened new plants on Thule and Rasalhague.  Bergan Industries became a huge part of the Ghost Bear's industrial base. They invested heavily in the company, and this investment allowed Bergan to expand into some other realms.
ReputationStatements: We've heard you're a competent mercenary. We've been having some issues recently, and if you could resolve them for Bergan Industries, we'll ensure you're paid well.
People are talking about you mercenary. We would like your help resolving some issues for us.
Greetings, Commander.  Your assistance would prove beneficial and lucrative to us both.  Hopefully you will agree.
Commander, your reputation as a potential 'fixer' is just what we need right now.  Perhaps you would like to 'clean up' this recent development?
You are truly on your way to being a permanent addition to our payroll, Commander.  Hopefully you and your associates can fix this small problem for us.
Commander, we need your abilities once again.  Help make this problem disappear and you will be well rewarded.
Commander, your skills and services are second to none.  We need someone of your calibre once again.
MissionSuccessStatements: Well done, Commander. We obviously placed our faith in the right mercenary company. We'll let you know if we have any other work for you.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: You win some, you lose some. Losing is not an ability we look for in a mercenary. At least you did not completely screw up the mission.
BadFaithFailureStatements: Who did you bribe to get such a high reputation, because it definitely was not from your skills.  You could not even complete the assigned task.
